name: Lux: The Journey
description:
Lux : The Journey is an atmospheric exploration game with light puzzle and platforming elements. Featuring an original soundtrack, and an infinite alien world of colorful hills. Partake in a world of strange and otherworldly beauty while discovering its mysteries.

The Story

You are left behind on a world built by the descendants of the first truly conscious beings created by The Humanity, a race long gone. To rejoin your people, you must travel far, and unearth the old guardians buried by time. See lands tinged with elements from parallel dimensions as you travel.

Survival

With the fusion of magic and tech, restore fantastic beasts to life, summon your house to you wherever you are, and harvest materials with an array of powerful staves. As a being powered by light, you will weaken the longer you stay in dark zones. Gather and combine materials to create artistic and useful objects. Your staves can be powered up to enable you to jump higher, run faster, dig more efficiently, and more.

Building

You can build structures out of the materials you excavate. Build voxel creations, structures with abilities, various decorations, and more.

In-Depth Tutorial

You have access to a tutorial world that will allow you to become familiar with all the different paths and activities to embark on. Make sure to familiarize yourself with all of your options.

The Future of Lux: The Journey

We welcome player feedback, be it resolving an error or input on desired updates to come. VR support is a high priority for us, and we hope to offer it eventually.
